trans-unit.source: Describes the compatibility guarantee of a component, type, or type member that may span multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 描述组件、 类型或类型成员可以跨多个版本的兼容性保证。

trans-unit.source: The ComponentGuaranteesOptions enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute> class to indicate the level of compatibility that is guaranteed for a component or class library that spans multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: ComponentGuaranteesOptions 枚举由<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>类，以指示的保证跨多个版本的组件或类库的兼容级别。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Exchange provides the strongest compatibility guarantee, followed by Stable and SideBySide.
trans-unit.target: Exchange 提供最有力的兼容性保证，跟稳定和 SideBySide。

trans-unit.source: None does not promise compatibility across versions.
trans-unit.target: None 不保证版本间的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the meaning of each guarantee, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关每个保证的含义的详细讨论，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>主题。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The developer promises multi-version exchange compatibility for the type.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员承诺多版本 exchange 兼容性类型。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of the type can expect compatibility across future versions and can use the type in all their interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的类型会在将来的版本兼容性，并且可以使用在其所有接口的类型。

trans-unit.source: Versioning problems cannot be fixed by side-by-side execution.
trans-unit.target: 通过并行执行不能解决版本控制问题。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The developer does not guarantee compatibility across versions.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员不保证版本间的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of the component, type, or member can expect future versions to break the existing client.
trans-unit.target: 组件、 类型或成员的使用者可以期望将来的版本会中断现有客户端。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The component has been tested to work when more than one version of the assembly is loaded into the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: 组件已经过测试，若要在多个版本的程序集加载到同一应用程序域时。

trans-unit.source: Future versions can break compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 未来版本可能会破坏兼容性。

trans-unit.source: However, when such breaking changes are made, the old version is not modified but continues to exist alongside the new version.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此类发生重大更改时, 旧版本则不会修改，但仍然无法并存的新版本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The developer promises stable compatibility across versions.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员跨版本承诺稳定的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of the type can expect that future versions will not break the existing client.
trans-unit.target: 类型的使用者可以预计将来的版本不会中断现有客户端。

trans-unit.source: However, if they do and if the client has not used the type in its interfaces, side-by-side execution may fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果他们这样做，并且客户端在其接口未使用的类型，通过并行执行可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
